sys_hub_flow.description:
This flow creates a Workplace by Facebook group with users based on a ServiceNow Incident.

Flow Steps:

  • Step I - Lookup Group member records: This step fetches the list of users belonging to the assignment group of the incident.
  • Step II - (Condition)If there are any users belonging to the assignment group of the incident.
    • Step IIa - (Sub-flow)Create Group: Creates the group in Workplace by Facebook.
    • Step IIb - For each group member record:
      • (Sub-flow)Add Users to Group: Adds the user to the group.
    • Step IIc - (Wait Condition): Wait until the Incident is 'Closed' or 'Cancelled'.
    • Step IId - (Sub-flow)Delete Group: Deletes the group from Workplace by Facebook.
  • Step III - (Condition)If there are no users belonging to the assignment group of the incident.
    • Step IIIa - Update Incident Record: Update work notes that group was not created as there were no users in the assignment group of the incident.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
